name: BLASTER LiLO
description:
Blast your way through an endless flow of enemies while you reach for unthinkable scores in this survival shoot'em up.Features:
-Endless survival with increasing difficulty

-Flashy pixel graphics

-Easy controls: just two buttons for shoot in the different directions and one button for the BLASTER BOMB

-4 characters, each with his unique shoot

-9 different enemies

-5 devastating powerups

-A crazy original OST

-Dodge, aim and grab powerups with the precision of the mouse

-Gamepad compatible too

-Multiplayer battle: challenge other players who survive the most or who reach a score first
